data.name: CreateCaseUnitFunctionAssignmt
ReadCaseUnit
data.value: select top(1) CU_NUMBER, CAS_NO from CKT_CASE_UNIT where (CAS_NO = @casNo) and (CU_NUMBER = @cuNumber)

data.name: ReadOfficeServiceProvider
data.value: select top(1) SPD_GENERATED_ID, OFF_GENERATED_ID, ROLE_CODE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE from CKT_OFFC_SRVC_PRVR where (SPD_GENERATED_ID = @spdGeneratedId) and (OFF_GENERATED_ID = @offGeneratedId) and (EFFECTIVE_DATE = @effectiveDate) and (ROLE_CODE = @roleCode)
